title: The Inside story; Tiny Pod and Silverwings
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Drug abuse - Study and teaching

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Study and teaching
Music & Performing Arts/Puppets and puppet-plays in education
description: Two puppet plays which have been designed as a resource for use in drug education programs. Looks at the concept of self, responsibility for self, self confidence and self esteem. By promoting good health and encouraging responsibility for self, it is hoped that young people, if and when faced with the decision to abuse drugs, will have sufficient self confidence and self esteem to make a rational decision. Written and performed by the Skylark Puppet and Mask Theatre.
